tool_description: Calculates story drifts and checks compliance with building code drift limits for serviceability and life safety.

floor_displacements.description: Lateral displacement at each floor in meters

story_heights.description: Height of each story in meters

deflection_amplification.description: Deflection amplification factor (Cd) for structural system

importance_factor.description: Seismic importance factor (I) based on occupancy

occupancy_category.description: Occupancy category for drift limits: residential, office, industrial, other

error_messages: Displacement array size error: Must have one displacement per floor (n floors, n displacements).
Story height array size error: Must have n-1 story heights for n floors.
Invalid amplification factor: Cd must be positive, typically 1.0-7.0 per structural system.
Negative displacements: Check sign convention - displacements should increase with height.
Invalid occupancy category: Use residential, office, industrial, or other.
usage: Input floor displacements from structural analysis, story heights, and structural system factors. Tool calculates amplified drifts and checks against code limits for specified occupancy.

story_drifts.description: Story drift at each level in meters

allowable_drift.description: Code allowable drift ratio for occupancy type
